alert.note: Alert for La Crosse (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:51PM CDT until April 12 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LA CROSSE...SOUTHERN JACKSON AND NORTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 350 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Black River Falls, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported 1" hail in Winona at 245 pm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Millston around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Melrose, Shamrock, The Black River Correctional Center, Pigeon Creek Campground, Potters Flowage, The North Flowage and Vaudreuil. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 109 and 135. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
